body: A creature with immunities takes no damage from listed sources. Immunities can also apply to afflictions, conditions, spells (based on school, level, or save type), and other effects. A creature that is immune does not suffer from these effects, or any secondary effects that are triggered due to an immune effect.
name: Immunity

sections.body: : Immune acid, fire, paralysis; Location: Defensive Abilities.
sections.name: Format
